mapper.select: select device.id,device.name,device.optionType,device.number,device_type.name as deviceType,storehouse.name as storehouse,contract.name as contract,device.price,device.createTime,supplier.name as supplierName, device.produceTime,device.price,device.priceUnit,device.status,device.optionType,batch.number as batchNumber,device.contractId,device.batchId,device.storehouseId,device.typeId,device.supplierId from device LEFT JOIN device_type ON device.typeId=device_type.id LEFT JOIN storehouse ON device.storehouseId=storehouse.id LEFT JOIN contract ON device.contractId=contract.id LEFT JOIN batch ON device.batchId=batch.id LEFT JOIN supplier ON device.supplierId=supplier.id LEFT JOIN customer ON contract.customerId=customer.id where device.appId=#{appId}
